overview:
Cecilia is an experienced PR and communications professional with over 15 years working for leading media groups in the digital landscape.

Cecilia participated in the launch of CNNÂ´s Brazilian website cnnemportugues.com and cnnbrasil.com besides having been assistant-editor/translator for FORTUNE Americas.

In 2003, Cecilia founded GECO - a knowledge management and communications company focused on providing high level-high quality business related content for leading corporations such as Citigroup.

This project lead Cecilia to develop MeuResumo - a company devoted to produce and deliver business book summaries in Portuguese in web and mobile formats.
